I think I have just the right business movie for you! Have you considered "The Hudsucker Proxy"? It's a quirky comedy that explores the world of corporate finance, with a young Tim Robbins playing a naive business graduate who gets caught up in a stock scam. The film has a great cast and a fun, offbeat tone that's sure to entertain.

If you're looking for something a bit more serious, "The Salon" might be up your alley. It's a heartwarming drama about a beauty-shop owner (played by Monica Calhoun) who finds romance as she struggles to save her business.
